attributes.action: Pay more to Administrative Workers with County Councils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Admin Workers are on low pay currently for 37 hours after tax take home around £900.00 per month - please sign this petition to improve pay rates within the Warwickshire County Council and the Public Sector.  The physical and emotional demands on admin workers are currently extremely high, comparing to different areas admin staff are on £2,500 more for the same job.  A company would not survive without adminstration staff to keep them afloat.  Acknowledgement is now required.
